CIPHER.0.cipherString: Be careful the environment you choose for it will shape you; be careful the friends you choose for you will become like them.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: Whoever you are, you will not write this book. I can tell you nothing. Do not call me again. Ever.

CIPHER.2.cipherString: As long as I have a want, I have a reason for living. Satisfaction is death.

CIPHER.3.cipherString: A difference of taste in jokes is a great strain on the affections.

CIPHER.4.cipherString: In the end, you're measured not by how much you undertake but by what you finally accomplish.

CIPHER.5.cipherString: Red Sox fans have been pushed to the brink over the years, but that's how faith grows stronger.

CIPHER.6.cipherString: Service to others is the rent you pay for your room here on earth.

CIPHER.7.cipherString: Apenas son suficientes mil años para formar un Estado; pero puede bastar una hora para reducirlo a polvo
CIPHER.7.question: Solve this xenocrypt.

CIPHER.8.cipherString: At every party there are two kinds of people - those who want to go home and those who don't. The trouble is, they are usually married to each other.

CIPHER.9.cipherString: I have always seen cold and controlled men as the right ones for me.

CIPHER.10.cipherString: I like the immediacy of blogs and the democratizing effects of letting millions of voices bloom on the Web.

CIPHER.11.cipherString: I certainly couldn't run a big country house, nor could I organize the greatest show on earth.
CIPHER.11.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Caesar cipher.

CIPHER.12.cipherString: We should not have a petty regard for God's gifts, though we may and should despise our own imperfections.

CIPHER.13.cipherString: I've never been in any country for more than four years, and I'm learning different languages all the time. It gives you a different attitude.

CIPHER.14.cipherString: Smile, it is the key that fits the lock of everybody's heart.

CIPHER.15.cipherString: Adversity causes some men to break, others to break records.

CIPHER.16.cipherString: For the last five years I've been in the production business.

CIPHER.17.cipherString: If I were president of the United States, I would include Moslems in my presidency.

CIPHER.19.cipherString: After 'Baby Doll,' I did some Westerns. I would try to do something so far away from 'Baby Doll.'
